description: {"blocks":[{"key":"59asv","text":"This protocol is for the collection of water samples for molecular analysis. It was used for collection of river water samples from Kathmandu for detection of S. Typhi and Paratyphi A","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ptil","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"c85m8","text":"DISCLAIMER – FOR INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY; USE AT YOUR OWN RISK","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpnd0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9jnvb","text":"The protocol content here is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal, medical, clinical, or safety advice, or otherwise; content added to protocols.io is not peer reviewed and may not have undergone a formal approval of any kind. guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"9bols","text":"NOTE: Bags are cleaned every day with 0.5% Hypochlorite followed by 70% ethanol before refilling the materials.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"74vru","text":"Materials for Field/Sampling: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ndka","text":"(Amount of materials required for a month of sampling)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67mqs","text":"1. 50ml Falcon tube for each sample point for the day and a field negative control. (29 tubes)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21lkc","text":"2. 50ml of sterile D/W as field negative control. (One for each sampling day)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8uhob","text":"3. 0.5% sodium hypochlorite ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6rpct","text":"4. 70% ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94onm","text":"5. Cotton/ Tissue paper","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee23m","text":"6. Ice packs (Frozen)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k24g","text":"7. pH meter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"du9kq","text":"8. Gloves","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71qeb","text":"9. Masks","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9i4g9","text":"10.  Bottle of D/W","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1hniv","text":"11.  Tube holder","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51kmp","text":"12.  Discard bag","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pecb","text":"13.  Permanent marker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Bag Preparation for sampling (Two separate bags, one for samples and another for sampling materials Or a bag with separate compartments for samples and the materials)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2f2hu","text":"Wipe the inner part of the sample bag with 0.5% Hypochlorite followed by 70% ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Bag Preparation for sampling (Two separate bags, one for samples and another for sampling materials Or a bag with separate compartments for samples and the materials)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"edo3h","text":"Place ice packs and a tube holder above the ice packs to place the collected samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Bag Preparation for sampling (Two separate bags, one for samples and another for sampling materials Or a bag with separate compartments for samples and the materials)
Bag Preparation for sampling (Two separate bags, one for samples and another for sampling materials Or a bag with separate compartments for samples and the materials)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1n8af","text":"Place each material in a separate clean ziplock bag before placing it inside the bag.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Bag Preparation for sampling (Two separate bags, one for samples and another for sampling materials Or a bag with separate compartments for samples and the materials)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"319hm","text":"Always place the pH meter in upright position so as not to spill the KCl (where the electrode is dipped).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Bag Preparation for sampling (Two separate bags, one for samples and another for sampling materials Or a bag with separate compartments for samples and the materials)
Bag Preparation for sampling (Two separate bags, one for samples and another for sampling materials Or a bag with separate compartments for samples and the materials)

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"33v0c","text":"Use the ArcGIS collector app to get to the designated sampling points.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"88tgr","text":"Collect 50ml of flowing river water sample in a sterile 50ml falcon tube by grab sampling technique.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bg51a","text":"Disinfect outer surface of the tube with cotton soaked in 0.5% sodium hypochlorite followed by 70% ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e81so","text":"Let the surface dry and label the tube with a fine tip permanent marker. Label each sample with Collection site code and Collection date.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"esq0h","text":"Eg: For Bagmati river site 1 sample collected on 13th March,2020 label the tube as","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6vo8a","text":"Transfer into a backpack containing ice packs for transportation to the laboratory under   cold conditions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ecut4","text":"Collect measurements of pH, ORP and temperature of the river water at the sampling point using a pH meter. After measurement at each site, rinse the probe of the pH meter with distilled water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ikj","text":"Record the results and complete the questionnaire in RedCap on a tablet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
